meta.title: YulaSanta - Online Secret Santa Draw
meta.description: Create free, ad-free online Secret Santa draws with friends, family, or colleagues in seconds!

giveaway.youtubeDesc: Easily draw from comments, likes, and subscribers on your YouTube videos.
giveaway.instagramDesc: Easily draw from comments and likes on your Instagram posts.
giveaway.twitterDesc: Easily draw from retweets, likes, and replies on Twitter/X.
giveaway.apiLimitation: Automatic fetching is currently unavailable due to platform limitations. Please use manual entry.
giveaway.manualDesc: Best for small giveaways (50-100 comments). Paste comments directly.
giveaway.autoDesc: Best for large giveaways and high volumes of comments.
